posts.post_content:
Not directly upgraded to [Jungle Shrine](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Jungle Shrine). This card enters the battlefield untapped, and can let you cast a [Sol Ring](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sol Ring) first turn. [Jungle Shrine](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Jungle Shrine) and the rest of the Alara tri-lands cannot.  
  
Even though these cards are quite terrible by today's standards, I must say that I still love their flavour.
posts.html:

Posted By: Fanaticmogg (2/3/2012 10:35:34 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Everyone needs to calm down about this whole strictly better thing. Deep down we all know that even with the drawback of coming into play tapped mostly anyone would still play [Jungle Shrine](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Jungle Shrine )  over this any day. And honestly in a tri color deck tapping for colorless most of the time is pretty useless. Now honestly this should be compaired to [Shimmering Grotto](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Shimmering Grotto). Which is just straight up better than the entire cycle. And don't tell me it isn't. because the only area that argument flies is in a limited environment. And in Homelands I would take a basic land in the wrong color over this anyday of the week.
posts.html:
